title: If the display property of an item is set to "none", it doesn't take effect in new pdf emitter.
OB: When the display property of an item is set to "none" in the new pdf emitter, the item is still visible in the generated PDF. This issue occurs regardless of the other styles and settings applied to the item.
EB: When the display property of an item is set to "none" in the new pdf emitter, the item should be completely hidden and not visible in the generated PDF.
SR: To reproduce this issue: 1. Open the application that uses the new pdf emitter. 2. Set the display property of an item to "none". 3. Generate a PDF using the new pdf emitter. 4. Inspect the generated PDF and verify if the item is still visible.
